channel.title: [Allstar] help

item.title: [Allstar] help
item.dc:creator: @tainted4pure tainted4pure
item.description:
@tainted4pure wrote:

I want to be able to equip some type of equipment (shield or ring) and it will half any damage dealt to me. So if jad originally hit me with a 80 it would half it to 40 and that would be dealt to me.

Also I want to add full teleporting animations & gfx for normal magic how would i do that. Here is the code

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by deadxsilence } else { setAnimation(715); teleportToX = 2867 + misc.random(2); teleportToY = 3594 + misc.random(2);; sendMessage("You teleport to the home area."); }

Read full topic
